title: Ticket #7625: Advertise whether execute node can make user namespace without privs
description: OSG sites are starting to run newer versions of Centos that have the ability for unprivileged users to create new user namespaces. This allows them to run singularity without root or setuid. They would like to target certain jobs there, and make decisions about what to do based on the availability of this feature. So, the condor_startd should advertise whether a machine has unprivileged access to user namespaces.
